verses.text: Him that is \w weak|strong="G0770"\w* in the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* receive \w ye|strong="G4355"\w*, \add but\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w doubtful|strong="G1261"\w* \w disputations|strong="G1253"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3303"\w* \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* that he may \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*: \w another|strong="G1161"\w*, who is \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*, \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* \w herbs|strong="G3001"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1848"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* him that \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* \w despise|strong="G1848"\w* him that \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G2919"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* him which \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* him that \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w received|strong="G4355"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* that \w judgest|strong="G2919"\w* another \w man’s|strong="G0245"\w* \w servant|strong="G3610"\w*? to his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w master|strong="G2962"\w* he \w standeth|strong="G4739"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w falleth|strong="G4098"\w*. \w Yea|strong="G1161"\w*, he shall be holden \w up|strong="G2476"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* to \w make|strong="G2476"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*.

One \w man|strong="G3739"\w* \w esteemeth|strong="G2919"\w* one \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w above|strong="G3844"\w* \w another|strong="G2250"\w*: \w another|strong="G3739"\w* \w esteemeth|strong="G2919"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \add alike\add*. \w Let|strong="G4135"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* be fully \w persuaded|strong="G4135"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w mind|strong="G3563"\w*.

He that \w regardeth|strong="G5426"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, \w regardeth|strong="G5426"\w* \add it\add* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that \w regardeth|strong="G5426"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w*, to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* he \w doth|strong="G5426"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w regard|strong="G5426"\w* \add it\add*. He that \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w*, \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w giveth|strong="G2168"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he that \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* he \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w giveth|strong="G2168"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* to \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w dieth|strong="G0599"\w* to \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w whether|strong="G1437"\w* we \w live|strong="G2198"\w*, we \w live|strong="G2198"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*; \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w whether|strong="G1437"\w* we \w die|strong="G0599"\w*, we \w die|strong="G0599"\w* unto the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*: \w whether|strong="G1437"\w* we \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w or|strong="G1437"\w* \w die|strong="G0599"\w*, we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* the \w Lord’s|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* this \w end|strong="G5124"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w rose|strong="G0450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w revived|strong="G0326"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he might be \w Lord|strong="G2961"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w dost|strong="G2919"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w dost|strong="G1848"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* set at \w nought|strong="G1848"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we \w shall|strong="G3936"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w stand|strong="G3936"\w* before the judgment \w seat|strong="G0968"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, \add As\add* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w knee|strong="G1119"\w* shall \w bow|strong="G2578"\w* to \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* shall \w confess|strong="G1843"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w So|strong="G0686"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w* shall \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w account|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

Let \w us|strong="G2919"\w* \w not|strong="G3371"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* one \w another|strong="G0240"\w* any \w more|strong="G3371"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w*, \w that|strong="G3588"\w* no \w man|strong="G3361"\w* \w put|strong="G5087"\w* a \w stumblingblock|strong="G4348"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* an occasion to \w fall|strong="G4625"\w* \w in|strong="G0080"\w* \add his\add* \w brother’s way|strong="G0080"\w*.

I \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* am \w persuaded|strong="G3982"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \add there is\add* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w unclean|strong="G2839"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w itself|strong="G1438"\w*: \w but|strong="G3361"\w* to him that \w esteemeth|strong="G3049"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w unclean|strong="G2839"\w*, to \w him|strong="G1565"\w* \add it is\add* \w unclean|strong="G2839"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* be \w grieved|strong="G3076"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \add thy\add* \w meat|strong="G1033"\w*, \w now|strong="G3765"\w* walkest \w thou|strong="G4043"\w* \w not|strong="G3765"\w* \w charitably|strong="G0026"\w*. \w Destroy|strong="G0622"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w him|strong="G1565"\w* \w with|strong="G1033"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w meat|strong="G1033"\w*, \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w died|strong="G0599"\w*.
\w Let|strong="G0987"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* be evil spoken \w of|strong="G0987"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w meat|strong="G1035"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drink|strong="G4213"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* he \w that|strong="G1398"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* these \w things|strong="G5125"\w* \w serveth|strong="G1398"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add is\add* \w acceptable|strong="G2101"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w approved|strong="G1384"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

Let \w us|strong="G1377"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* follow \w after|strong="G1377"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* which make for \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* wherewith one may \w edify|strong="G3619"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1752"\w* \w meat|strong="G1033"\w* \w destroy|strong="G2647"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. All \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* \add are\add* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \add it is\add* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* for that \w man|strong="G0444"\w* who \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w offence|strong="G4348"\w*.

\add It is\add* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w neither|strong="G3361"\w* to \w eat|strong="G5315"\w* \w flesh|strong="G2907"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* to \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w*, \w nor|strong="G3366"\w* \add any thing\add* \w whereby|strong="G1722"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* \w stumbleth|strong="G4350"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* is \w offended|strong="G4624"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* is made \w weak|strong="G0770"\w*.

\w Hast|strong="G2192"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*? \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \add it\add* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w thyself|strong="G4572"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*. \w Happy|strong="G3107"\w* \add is\add* he that \w condemneth|strong="G2919"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* that thing \w which|strong="G3739"\w* he \w alloweth|strong="G1381"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he that \w doubteth|strong="G1252"\w* is \w damned|strong="G2632"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* he \w eat|strong="G5315"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \add he eateth\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G3956"\w* \add is\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.
